WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 17, DNC 18.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED IN 41-23.50N 059-03.02W.
RCC BOSTON IS REQUESTING M/V CARME AND
M/V FEDERAL KIBUNE CONTACT RCC BOSTON
EITHER BY PHONE AT 1-866-842-1560 OR BY EMAIL
AT RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC BOSTON,
PHONE: 866 842 1560,
EMAIL: RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL.
